reviewText: I am a big holyfield fan. I like watching all the fights but I noticed there were certain fights where the disc skipped to the next fight. That is why I give a four instead of five.
My husband LOVED getting this as a gift!

If ur Evander  Holyfield fan, these r for u. And even if u just love boxing. Great action. These  fights r really something Every dvd of the holyfield u could want. It was good price, fast delivery to United kingdom, scotland.  Buy this! U will not regret it. Trust me.
